item.title: Karen The Chicken
item.description:
About This Game

In "Karen The Chicken," players are catapulted into the charming yet challenging life of Karen, a chicken whose routine farm life is turned upside down by a sudden and inexplicable kidnapping to an alien planet. Beyond the barnyard, Karen must navigate through the enigmatic halls of a strange factory, facing new trials at every turn.

**Vivid Alien Planet Exploration:**
Discover a richly detailed alien planet that's equal parts fascinating and foreboding. Each section of this factory harbors its own set of unique gameplay mechanics, from surfing on the backs of aliens to manipulating teleporting eggs.

**Gameplay That Evolves With You:**
As Karen, you'll adapt to ever-changing gameplay dynamics that challenge you in unexpected ways. What starts with placing eggs in nests soon warps into avoiding industrial hazards and unlocking the secrets of an alien landscape.

**Enigma After Enigma:**
Your feathery protagonist might have been a simple farmyard fowl, but now she's the hero of her own story, fraught with bizarre events and peculiar characters. Each level you conquer and mystery you solve will bring Karen closer to understanding her predicament.

**Embrace The Oddities:**
Navigate your way through levels that twist the familiar into something entirely new. From gravity-defying leaps to spatial puzzles, "Karen The Chicken" ensures that both your wits and reflexes are put to the test.

**Charming and Curious Aesthetic:**
"Karen The Chicken" blends pastoral charm with the strange beauty of an alien world, all set to an engaging soundtrack that captures the whimsy and intrigue of your quest.

It’s time to step out of the henhouse and into a world teeming with questions, quests, and quirky encounters. As Karen flutters about the alien factory, each peculiar puzzle brings her closer to unraveling the reason behind her abduction and crafting an escape. Will you help Karen spread her wings to soar towards the truth, or will she remain the universe's unluckiest chicken? Join the adventure and lay the foundation for a most extraordinary escape!

item.title: Back Then
item.description:
About This Game


We all live with the fear of reaching the shadow of dementia. The ultimate fear of forgetting. The fear of not remembering our past, what led us here. For who do we become when we forget who we are?



Back Then is a first-person narrative game journey taking place in the mind of Thomas Eilian, an elderly writer diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.
The gameplay, presented in first-person perspective, is story-driven and is heavily focused on interactions, puzzles and detective exploration.



Stuck in a Wheelchair, players find themselves lost in a house, discovering more about Thomas and his family by unlocking new rooms, collectibles, objectives and puzzles. Together, both the player and Thomas attempt to discover who they are, listening to the monologues of Thomas and his family, detailing their own struggles and perspectives of the situation at hand.

Players traverse through the four seasons of the year, going back and forth between the House and Dreamlike Sequences as Thomas attempts to unravel what his life meant.





Back Then is a game for people who are in search of unconventional and new story-rich experiences.
It appeals to a more general audience, emphasizing on the game's atmosphere, soundtrack, and narrated-exploration to deliver players a poetic and emotional story.

  • In-depth narrative and storytelling experience.
  • Detective exploration and puzzles.
  • Creative gameplay and events related to Alzheimer’s and forgetfulness.
  • Inspired by personal events, involving the team's loved ones and family.





Back Then is a story about Time, Death, and who we become when we forget who we are.

Through this story we hope to make as many people as we can uncomfortable, but aware to the reality of millions around the world diagnosed with Dementia and Alzheimer's Disease.



We know what it's like... To have someone whom we love no longer even recognise you.
We become familiar strangers in their eyes.
We dedicate this game to you, your loved ones...
And all who were back then.

item.title: Garbage Crew!
item.description:
About This Game




About Garbage Crew!

Garbage Crew! is a game about chaos! You work in a team with two to four players and an angry garbage truck driver. Your job is to empty garbage cans and containers. Sadly, your contract doesn't state what kind of work you are required to do, so your boss loads you with all kinds of extra tasks, including firefighting and forest work. Naturally you are completely understaffed, and your short-tempered driver has no intention of stopping the truck to wait for you, just because you couldn't empty all the garbage cans while extinguishing a raging wildfire. Luckily, there are heaps of powerups that help you with all those tasks, so your stress level won't reach dangerous heights... Or so you thought! Due to an accident in your bosses DIY time reverting device, you travel back into medieval times with seemingly no way to return and to make matters worse, your contract states that you are still required to work! So better get yourself a sword because the town is in the middle of a siege!


Gameplay


Garbage Crew! is a roguelike, action, couch-coop game, where, to archive victory, you and your team must make a fight plan on how to coordinate your operation to complete all incentives and make it to the level goal in time. Don't worry if you need a few tries, you’ll earn money with every run, so you and your friends can choose from a lot of different powerups that will help you in your next playthrough! While in game all kinds of unexpected events occur so make sure you come prepared to adapt to all circumstances! After all, you are doing like 5 jobs at the same time, all while the town is actively besieged!

The game features endless randomized levels in two completely different settings each with a lot of unique mechanics to make every run a new challenge!

Multiplayer Only!

In Garbage Crew! you need to communicate and cooperate to bring order into chaos. Workplace regulations wouldn’t allow for only one person to shoulder all those responsibilities, so please bring at least one friend to keep those pesky lawyers away. Don’t worry if the size of your couch isn’t sufficient to fit all your friends, the game fully supports Steam Remote Play Together so everyone can play from everywhere in the world!


Features

  • Endless Random Levels
  • Two completely different settings
  • Local Coop
  • Online Coop via Steam Remote Play Together
  • Tons of powerups
  • All the jobs you’ve always wanted to try… at once!
    - Waste Collector
    - Firefighter
    - Forrest worker
    - Knight
    - Truck Driver
    - Car Mechanic (Or at least someone that pushes a truck uphill)
  • 50+ Different Skins
  • Play a level with a custom seed or with custom difficulty
